metadata.synopsis: In the Bhaal Temple, Orin may kill the abductee during dialog due to a failed Skillcheck or players encouraging her to kill them.This is the PAD that plays reacting to the dead abductee after the battle.The abductee could be Laezel, Minthara, Gale, Halsin or Yenna.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: An unnatural death. There's no coming back from that.
0.context: NodeContext: [Astarion: bummed, but not REALLY willing to take responsibility for the killing.]
